df-cfil
blocks.content: Define the set of Cauchy filters on a given extended metric space. A Cauchy filter is a filter on the set such that for every ` 0 < x ` there is an element of the filter whose metric diameter is less than ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cfil(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccfil, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cxmet)), crab(s1, cfv(cfil, cdm(cdm(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cima(cv(s0), cxp(cv(s3), cv(s3))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cfil(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ CauFil =(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(*Met)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(Fil ` dom(dom(s0)))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s0 "(s3 √ó s3))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s2)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-cau
blocks.content: Define the set of Cauchy sequences on a given extended metric space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cau(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cau(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ Cau =(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(*Met)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(dom(dom(s0))[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§,((s1 |`(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s3)):(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s3)‚Üí((s1 ` s3)[(ball ` s0)]s2))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: lmmbr
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space. Definition 1.4-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 25. The condition ` F C_ ( CC X. X ) ` allows us to use objects more general than sequences when convenient; see the comment in ~ df-lm . (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)

thm lmmbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  ‚ä£ c1 =(MetOpen ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(*Met ` c3))

blocks.name: lmmbr2
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space. Definition 1.4-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 25. The condition ` F C_ ( CC X. X ) ` allows us to use objects more general than sequences when convenient; see the comment in ~ df-lm . (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)

  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c4, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))))), diffsw(s1, w0))

blocks.name: lmmbr3
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space using an arbitrary upper set of integers. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmmbr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c5, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(cxmet, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cz))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c5, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))

thm lmmbr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0)))))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(MetOpen ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà(*Met ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0))))))), d(s0, c4))
  bitr4d(w0, c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2, (c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0))))), (c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0))))))
  lmmbr2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  3anbi3d(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0)))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0)))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, w0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c5]c2)[<]s0))))

  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wbr(co(c1, c3, c4), clt, c5)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c8)), wcel(cfv(c8, cv(s1)), c2), wbr(co(cfv(c8, cv(s1)), c3, c4), clt, c5)))))

  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c1[c3]c4)[<]c5))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(s1 ‚àà dom(c8)‚àß(c8 ` s1)‚àà c2 ‚àß((c8 ` s1)[c3]c4)[<]c5))))

  rexralbidv(s0, s1, c0, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), hs0 = c5, (s1 ‚àà dom(c8)‚àß(c8 ` s1)‚àà c2 ‚àß((c8 ` s1)[c3]c4)[<]hs0), (s1 ‚àà dom(c8)‚àß(c8 ` s1)‚àà c2 ‚àß((c8 ` s1)[c3]c4)[<]c5))

blocks.name: lmmbrf
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space using an arbitrary upper set of integers. This version of ~ lmmbr2 presupposes that ` F ` is a function. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)

thm lmmbrf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cxmet, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cz))

  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4rd(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  biantrurd(w0, wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)))

  cnex()
  jctr(wf(c0, c4, c3), wss(c4, cc))

  anbi2d(w0, wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, w0, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))

  ralbidva(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))
  syldan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))), wb(wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), c4))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c4))
  uztrn2(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2), c7)
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4), wb(wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))
  bitr3d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4))), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))
  adantrl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4), wb(wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(c5, c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))
  breq1d(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0), co(c5, c6, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c4)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c4)))
  adantrl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4), wb(wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))
  syl6bbr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c4)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))
  biantrurd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c4)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c4)), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3))

  syl6bb(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wa(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0)))))))), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c3, cpm, cc)), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c4, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c6, c2), clt, cv(s0))))))))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(c5[c6]c2)[<]s0))))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(MetOpen ` c6)

  syl2an(c6 ‚àà(*Met ` c3), (c0 : c4 ‚Üí c3), c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ), (c3 ‚àà dom(*Met)‚àß ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå), ((c0 : c4 ‚Üí c3)‚àß c4 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ))
  jctir(c6 ‚àà(*Met ` c3), c3 ‚àà dom(*Met), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvdm(c6, cxmet, c3)

  eqsstri(c4, cc, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c7))

  zsscn()

  anbi2d(w0, c2 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(c5[c6]c2)[<]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c6]c2)[<]s0)))))

  syldan((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4), s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1), ((c5[c6]c2)[<]s0 ‚Üî(s2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s2)‚àà c3 ‚àß((c0 ` s2)[c6]c2)[<]s0)), s2 ‚àà c4)

thm iscfil(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cfv(cfil, c1), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))))

  cfilfval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c2, cfv(cfil, c1), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(CauFil ` c0)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1), c2 ‚àà(CauFil ` c0), (c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0)))), c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0)))})
  eleq2d(c2, (CauFil ` c0), { hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0)))}, c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1))
  cfilfval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c2, (Fil ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, hs0 = c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0)))
  rexeq(s1, hs0, c2, (c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 "(s1 √ó s1))‚äÜ(0[[,)]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cfilfil

blocks.content: Property of a Cauchy filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

thm cfili(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(c2, crp)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, c2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(c2, crp), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, c2)))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, cv(hs0)))))))

  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cdm(cdm(c1)))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, cv(hs0))))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cdm(cdm(c1)))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, cdm(cdm(c1)))))

  mptrcl(hs1, c0, ccfil, c1, cuni(crn(cxmet)), crab(hs2, cfv(cfil, cdm(cdm(cv(hs1)))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cv(hs2), wss(cima(cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))))
  df-cfil(hs1, hs2, s0, s1)
  xmetunirn(c1)
  iscfil2(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1, cdm(cdm(c1)), c0)
  rspccva(hs0, crp, c2, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt, c2)))))

  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), clt)

blocks.name: cfil3i
blocks.content: A Cauchy filter contains balls of any pre-chosen size. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfil3i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(c3, crp)), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), c3), c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(c3, crp)), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), c3), c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), clt, c3)))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(c3, crp), wrex(hs1, c2, wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), clt, c3)))))
  cfili(hs1, s0, hs0, c2, c0, c3)

blocks.name: cfilss
blocks.content: A filter finer than a Cauchy filter is Cauchy. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

thm cfilss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(ccfil, c0)))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfil, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c3, wss(cima(c0, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1))))))

  adantl(c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1), c2 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ(c1[filGen]c2))

blocks.name: fmcfil
blocks.content: The Cauchy filter condition for a filter map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmcfil(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s3, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s3, c2))
  3bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0)))))), wcel(co(c1, cfg, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1))))), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(hs2, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  eleq1d(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(ccfil, c0), co(c1, cfg, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1))))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), co(c1, cfg, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, cdm(cxmet)))
  fmval(s1, c1, cdm(cxmet), c2, c3, c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c1, cfg, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1))))), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(hs2, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(c1, cdm(cxmet)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1))

  eqid(crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))))
  fgcfil(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wrex(hs2, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wrex(hs2, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(co(cfv(c4, cv(s2)), c0, cfv(c4, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(hs0, cima(c4, cv(s1)), wral(hs1, cima(c4, cv(s1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wrex(hs2, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, cima(c4, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(hs0, cima(c4, cv(s1)), wral(hs1, cima(c4, cv(s1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), clt, cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(c4, cv(s1)), universe)))
  ralrimivw(s1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(cima(c4, cv(s1)), universe))
  ssexd(cima(c4, cv(s1)), c1, cdm(cxmet), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(c1, cdm(cxmet)))
  elfvdm(c0, cxmet, c1)
  syl5ss(cima(c4, cv(s1)), c1, crn(c4), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  imassrn(c4, cv(s1))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wss(crn(c4), c1))
  frn(c4, c3, c1)

blocks.name: iscfil3
blocks.content: A filter is Cauchy iff it contains a ball of any chosen size. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cfilfcls
blocks.content: Similar to ultrafilters ( ~ uffclsflim ), the cluster points and limit points of a Cauchy filter coincide. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfilfcls(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wceq(co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cdm(cdm(c1)))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  rexlimddv(hs4, crp, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs4, crp, wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c3)))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(hs4, crp, wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1))))
  mopni2(hs4, c1, c3, cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs4), crp), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), c0), wss(cv(hs1), c3), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1)))
  ad2antrr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs4), crp), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  ad2ant2r(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), c0))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cbl, c1), co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2)), c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp)), wrex(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cbl, c1), co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2)), c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2), crp))

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp)), wcel(co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2), crp), wcel(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), crp))

  ad2antrr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cbl, c1), co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2)), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cbl, c1), co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2)), c0))), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs4)), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs4), cxr))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs4), crp), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cbl, c1), co(co(cv(hs4), cdiv, nat2), cdiv, nat2)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs4), cxr))
  rpxr(cv(hs4))

blocks.name: caufval
blocks.content: The set of Cauchy sequences on a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: iscau3
blocks.content: Express the Cauchy sequence property in the more conventional three-quantifier form. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscau3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, cc)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c3, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c2), wral(s3, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c1, cfv(c0, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s0))))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

blocks.name: iscau4
blocks.content: Express the property " ` F ` is a Cauchy sequence of metric ` D ` " using an arbitrary upper set of integers. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: iscauf
blocks.content: Express the property " ` F ` is a Cauchy sequence of metric ` D ` " presupposing ` F ` is a function. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscauf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c1)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4rd(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c1)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(c6, cpm, cc)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  biantrurd(w0, wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, co(c6, cpm, cc)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c6, cpm, cc)), wa(wcel(c6, cdm(cxmet)), wcel(cc, universe)), wa(wf(c0, c2, c6), wss(c2, cc)))
  jctir(w0, wcel(c6, cdm(cxmet)), wcel(cc, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cdm(cxmet)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c6)))
  elfvdm(c1, cxmet, c6)
  cnex()
  jctir(w0, wf(c0, c2, c6), wss(c2, cc))
  eqsstri(c2, cc, cfv(cuz, c5))
  sstri(cfv(cuz, c5), cc, cz)
  uzssz(c5)
  zsscn()
  elpm2r(c6, cdm(cxmet), cc, universe, c0, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, crp, w0, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0))))))
  rexbidva(s1, c2, w0, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0)))))
  ralbidva(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0))))
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))), wb(wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0)))))
  bitrd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))), wbr(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c4, c6), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(co(c4, c1, c3), clt, cv(s0)))
  breq1d(co(c3, c1, c4), clt, cv(s0), co(c4, c1, c3), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))), wceq(co(c3, c1, c4), co(c4, c1, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c6)), wcel(c3, c6), wcel(c4, c6))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c6)))
  eqeltrrd(c3, c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c3))
  ffvelrnd(c0, cv(s1), c6, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), wf(c0, c2, c6))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))))

blocks.name: caufpm
blocks.content: Inclusion of a Cauchy sequence, under our definition. (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: caucfil
blocks.content: A Cauchy sequence predicate can be expressed in terms of the Cauchy filter predicate for a suitably chosen filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: iscmet
blocks.content: The property " ` D ` is a complete metric." meaning all Cauchy filters converge to a point in the space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscmet(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, ccmet, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cmet, c1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cfv(cmet, c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1), crab(hs0, cfv(cmet, c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs1, c1, universe, ccmet, crab(hs0, cfv(cmet, c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))), crab(hs0, cfv(cmet, cv(hs1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  rabeqdv(hs0, cfv(cmet, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmet, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cmet)
  df-cmet(hs1, hs0, s0)
  rabex(hs0, cfv(cmet, c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  fvex(cmet, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cfv(cmet, c1), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wral(s0, cfv(ccfil, c0), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(ccfil, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccfil, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls), wne(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccfil)
  neeq1d(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls, co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmopn, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

blocks.name: cmetcau
blocks.content: The convergence of a Cauchy sequence in a complete metric space. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2015.)

thm cmetcau(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0))), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0))), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  cmetmet(c0, c1)

  caun0(c0, c1, c2)
  n0(hs0, c1)

  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccau, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, cn, cif(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c2)))))

blocks.name: iscmet3
blocks.content: The property " ` D ` is a complete metric" expressed in terms of functions on ` NN ` (or any other upper integer set). Thus, we only have to look at functions on ` NN ` , and not all possible Cauchy filters, to determine completeness. (The proof uses countable choice.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: A metric ` D ` is complete iff all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the space. The proof uses countable choice. Part of Definition 1.4-3 of [Kreyszig] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscmet2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  cmetmet(c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  cmetcau(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wral(hs0, cfv(ccau, c0), wi(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))), wral(hs0, cfv(ccau, c0), wi(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(ccau, c0), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))), wi(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  a1d(wa(wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0))), wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  ssel2(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)), cv(hs0))
  iscmet3(hs0, c0, c1, cn, c2, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  nnuz()
  1zzd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccau, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))

thm iscmet2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(MetOpen ` c0)
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))))
  jca(c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1), (Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  cmetmet(c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, (Cau ` c0), dom((~~>t ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1))
  ex(c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(Cau ` c0), hs0 ‚àà dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  cmetcau(c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))), c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Cau ` c0),((hs0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà dom((~~>t ` c2)))))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1), (Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Cau ` c0),((hs0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà dom((~~>t ` c2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (Cau ` c0), (Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2)), ((hs0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà dom((~~>t ` c2))))
  a1d(((Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Cau ` c0)), (hs0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  ssel2((Cau ` c0), dom((~~>t ` c2)), hs0)
  iscmet3(hs0, c0, c1, cn, c2, nat1, (c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))))
  nnuz()
  1zzd((c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1), (Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((Cau ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(CMet ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w((Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1)‚àß(Cau ` c0)‚äÜ dom((~~>t ` c2))))
}

blocks.name: cfilresi
blocks.content: A Cauchy filter on a metric subspace extends to a Cauchy filter in the larger space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: equivcfil
blocks.content: If the metric ` D ` is "strongly finer" than ` C ` (meaning that there is a positive real constant ` R ` such that ` C ( x , y ) <_ R x. D ( x , y ) ` ), all the ` D ` -Cauchy filters are also ` C ` -Cauchy. (Using this theorem twice in each direction states that if two metrics are strongly equivalent, then they have the same Cauchy sequences.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm equivcfil(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccfil, c0), cfv(ccfil, c1)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(ccfil, c0), cfv(ccfil, c1), w0)
  3imtr4d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfil, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2)), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  imdistanda(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimdva(hs2, crp, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2))), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  syld(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), co(cv(hs2), cdiv, c3)), cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wi(wral(hs1, crp, wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), co(cv(hs2), cdiv, c3)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cdiv, c3), crp))

  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), crp))

blocks.name: equivcau
blocks.content: If the metric ` D ` is "strongly finer" than ` C ` (meaning that there is a positive real constant ` R ` such that ` C ( x , y ) <_ R x. D ( x , y ) ` ), all the ` D ` -Cauchy sequences are also ` C ` -Cauchy. (Using this theorem twice in each direction states that if two metrics are strongly equivalent, then they have the same Cauchy sequences.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2015.)

thm equivcau(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccau, c0), cfv(ccau, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crp))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cle, co(c3, cmul, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3sstr4d(cfv(ccau, c0), cfv(ccau, c1), crab(hs1, co(c2, cpm, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs0, cz, wf(cres(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs2)))))), crab(hs1, co(c2, cpm, cc), wral(hs3, crp, wrex(hs0, cz, wf(cres(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbl, c1), cv(hs3)))))), w0)

blocks.name: lmle
blocks.content: If the distance from each member of a converging sequence to a given point is less than or equal to a given amount, so is the convergence value. (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), cle, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmopn, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c8, cfv(clm, c6), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wbr(co(c0, c1, cfv(c8, cv(s0))), cle, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), cle, c3), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c4, w0, wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))
  lmff(hs1, c4, c8, c7, c5, c6, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wcel(c8, cdm(cfv(clm, c6))), wrel(cfv(clm, c6)), wbr(c8, cfv(clm, c6), c2))
  lmrel(c6)
  releldm(cfv(clm, c6), c8, c2)
  lmcld(s0, c2, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), c6, c7, c8, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7)), wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, c7)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, c7)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c7)))
  mopntopon(c1, c7, c6)
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, c5)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, c5), c4, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))))
  eluzelz(cv(hs1), c5)
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7)), wbr(c8, cfv(clm, c6), c2))
  elrabd(hs0, cfv(c8, cv(s0)), c7, wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)))), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, c1, cfv(c8, cv(s0))), cle, c3))
  breq1d(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3, co(c0, c1, cfv(c8, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c8, cv(s0))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c8, cv(s0)), c0, c1)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(c8, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cv(s0)), cfv(c8, cv(s0))))
  fvres(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c8)
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), c7, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))
  syldan(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), wbr(co(c0, c1, cfv(c8, cv(s0))), cle, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  sylan(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7))
  uztrn2(cv(hs1), c4, cv(s0), c5)
  adantlr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cfv(c8, cv(s0))), cle, c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wf(cres(c8, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c7)), wcel(crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cfv(ccld, c6)))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cfv(ccld, c6)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c7)), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(c3, cxr))
  blcld(hs0, c1, c7, c0, c3, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), c6)
  eqid(crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)))
  simprbi(wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), cle, c3), wcel(c2, c7))
  elrab(hs0, c2, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), cle, c3))
  breq1d(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3, co(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c8)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, c7, wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: nglmle
blocks.content: If the norm of each member of a converging sequence is less than or equal to a given amount, so is the norm of the convergence value. (Contributed by NM, 25-Dec-2007.) (Revised by AV, 16-Oct-2021.)

thm nglmle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, c5, cfv(c0g, c4))), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3))
  nmval2(c4, c1, c3, c0, c5, cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cds, c4))

  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  eqbrtrrd(co(cfv(c0g, c4), c5, cfv(c7, cv(s0))), cle, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c7, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cfv(c7, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0g, c4), c5, cfv(c7, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c7, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0g, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c7, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c7, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0g, c4))), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(cfv(c7, cv(s0)), c3))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c5, cfv(cxmet, c3)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(cxmet, c3)), wcel(c4, cxms))

blocks.name: lmclimf
blocks.content: Relate a limit on the metric space of complex numbers to our complex number limit notation. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmclimf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc)), wb(wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c3), c4), wbr(c1, cli, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
} = {
  mpbirand(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc)), wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c3), c4), wbr(c1, cli, c4), wcel(c1, co(cc, cpm, cc)))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc)), wcel(c1, co(cc, cpm, cc)), wf(c1, c2, cc), wss(c2, cc))
  eqsstri(c2, cc, cfv(cuz, c0))
  sstri(cfv(cuz, c0), cc, cz)
  uzssz(c0)
  zsscn()
  mpanl12(wa(wf(c1, c2, cc), wss(c2, cc)), wcel(c1, co(cc, cpm, cc)), wcel(cc, universe), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  elpm2r(cc, universe, cc, universe, c1, c2)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc), wb(wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c3), c4), wa(wcel(c1, co(cc, cpm, cc)), wbr(c1, cli, c4))), wss(c2, cdm(c1)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc)), wss(c2, cdm(c1)), wf(c1, c2, cc), wceq(cdm(c1), c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wf(c1, c2, cc))
  fdm(c1, c2, cc)
  eqimss2(cdm(c1), c2)
  lmclim(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4)
}

thm lmclimf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß(c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))‚Üí(c1[(~~>t ` c3)]c4 ‚Üî c1[~~>]c4))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c0)
} = {
  mpbirand((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß(c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)), c1[(~~>t ` c3)]c4, c1[~~>]c4, c1 ‚àà(‚ÑÇ[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ))
  sylancl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß(c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)), c1 ‚àà(‚ÑÇ[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ), (c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  eqsstri(c2, cc, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c0))
  sstri((‚Ñ§‚â• ` c0), cc, cz)
  uzssz(c0)
  zsscn()
  mpanl12(((c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ), c1 ‚àà(‚ÑÇ[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå, ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  cnex()
  elpm2r(cc, universe, cc, universe, c1, c2)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c1[(~~>t ` c3)]c4 ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà(‚ÑÇ[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c1[~~>]c4)), c2 ‚äÜ dom(c1))
  3syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß(c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)), c2 ‚äÜ dom(c1), (c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), dom(c1)= c2)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))

blocks.name: metelcls
blocks.content: A point belongs to the closure of a subset iff there is a sequence in the subset converging to it. Theorem 1.4-6(a) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. This proof uses countable choice ~ ax-cc . The statement can be generalized to first-countable spaces, not just metrizable spaces. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm metelcls(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c1), c0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c1), c0))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c1), c0))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c1), c0)))), wcel(c1, c1stc), wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, c1stc), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  met1stc(c3, c4, c1)
  sseqtrd(c2, cuni(c1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c4, cuni(c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  mopnuni(c3, c4, c1)
  1stcelcls(s0, c1, c2, cuni(c1), c0)
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
}

thm metelcls(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà((cls ` c1)` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c2)‚àß s0[(~~>t ` c1)]c0))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(MetOpen ` c3)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà((cls ` c1)` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c2)‚àß s0[(~~>t ` c1)]c0)))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà((cls ` c1)` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c2)‚àß s0[(~~>t ` c1)]c0)))), d(s0, w0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà((cls ` c1)` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c2)‚àß s0[(~~>t ` c1)]c0))), c1 ‚àà 1stc, c2 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà 1stc, c3 ‚àà(*Met ` c4))
  met1stc(c3, c4, c1)
  sseqtrd(c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 = ‚ãÉ c1, c3 ‚àà(*Met ` c4))
  mopnuni(c3, c4, c1)
  1stcelcls(s0, c1, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: metcld
blocks.content: A subset of a metric space is closed iff every convergent sequence on it converges to a point in the subset. Theorem 1.4-6(b) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm metcld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2), c2))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2), c2)), wcel(c3, ctop), wss(c2, cuni(c3)))
  mopntop(c0, c1, c3)
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c3)))
  sseq2d(c2, c1, cuni(c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  mopnuni(c0, c1, c3)
  iscld4(c3, c2, cuni(c3))
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2), c2), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  albidv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wex(s1, wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  imbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wex(s1, wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0)))))
  metelcls(s1, cv(s0), c3, c2, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  19.23v(s1, wa(wf(cv(s1), cn, c2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  dfss2(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c3), c2), c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cxmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cxmet, c1)
  diff.cxmet.s(s0)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccl, c3)
  diff.ccl.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(Clsd ` c3)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(((s1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1[(~~>t ` c3)]s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2)))))

blocks.name: metcld2
blocks.content: A subset of a metric space is closed iff every convergent sequence on it converges to a point in the subset. Theorem 1.4-6(b) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)

thm metcld2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
} = {

  syl5rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, c3), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(cfv(clm, c3), co(c2, cmap, cn))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, cn)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, c3), cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: caublcls
blocks.content: The convergent point of a sequence of nested balls is in the closures of any of the balls (i.e. it is in the intersection of the closures). Indeed, it is the only point in the intersection because a metric space is Hausdorff, but we don't prove this here. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:

thm iscmet3i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))

  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wf(cv(s0), cn, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mprgbir(s0, cfv(ccau, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wi(wf(cv(s0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(ccau, c0), wi(wf(cv(s0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cfv(clm, c2)))))))
  iscmet3(s0, c0, c1, cn, c2, nat1, wtru)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))

  diff.cn.s(s0)

}

blocks.name: flimcfil
blocks.content: Every convergent filter in a metric space is a Cauchy filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

thm flimcfil(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(c4, cfv(ccfil, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(c4, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4))))
  eleqtrrd(c4, cfv(cfil, c1), cfv(cfil, cuni(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfil, cuni(c3))))
  flimfil(c2, c3, c4, cuni(c3))
  fveq2d(cfil, c1, cuni(c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wceq(c1, cuni(c3)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, crp, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c2))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c2))), wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(c2, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), crp), wcel(c3, ctop))
  mopntop(c0, c1, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr))
  rpxr(cv(hs1))
  blopn(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1), c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wcel(c2, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))
  eleqtrrd(c2, c1, cuni(c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)))

  blcntr(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1))
  opnneip(c3, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c2)
  flimnei(c2, c3, c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)))
  rspcev(hs0, c2, c1, wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4)), wb(wcel(c4, cfv(ccfil, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4))))))
  iscfil3(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c4)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cflim, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs1)), c4))

  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c3[fLim]c4))‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù+), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(hs0[(ball ` c0)]hs1)‚àà c4), c2 ‚àà c1, (c2[(ball ` c0)]hs1)‚àà c4)

blocks.name: cmetss
blocks.content: A subspace of a complete metric space is complete iff it is closed in the parent space. Theorem 1.4-7 of [Kreyszig] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 9-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: equivcmet
blocks.content: If two metrics are strongly equivalent, one is complete iff the other is. Unlike ~ equivcau , ~ metss2 , this theorem does not have a one-directional form - it is possible for a metric ` C ` that is strongly finer than the complete metric ` D ` to be incomplete and vice versa. Consider ` D = ` the metric on ` RR ` induced by the usual homeomorphism from ` ( 0 , 1 ) ` against the usual metric ` C ` on ` RR ` and against the discrete metric ` E ` on ` RR ` . Then both ` C ` and ` E ` are complete but ` D ` is not, and ` C ` is strongly finer than ` D ` , which is strongly finer than ` E ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: relcmpcmet
blocks.content: If ` D ` is a metric space such that all the balls of some fixed size are relatively compact, then ` D ` is complete. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cmpcmet
blocks.content: A compact metric space is complete. One half of ~ heibor . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmpcmet(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
} = {
  relcmpcmet(hs0, c0, c1, c2, nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, crp))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(co(c2, crest, cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1))), ccmp), wcel(c2, ccmp), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1)), cfv(ccld, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c2, ccmp))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1)), cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(c2, ctop), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1), cuni(c2)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  mopntop(c0, c1, c2)
  sseqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1), cuni(c2), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  mp1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(nat1, cxr), wcel(nat1, crp))
  1rp()
  rpxr(nat1)
  blssm(c0, c1, cv(hs0), nat1)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  metxmet(c0, c1)
  mopnuni(c0, c1, c2)
  clscld(c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  cmpcld(c2, cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cbl, c0), nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: cfilucfil3

  xmetpsmet(c1, c0)
  syl6bb(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cmetu, c1)))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c0)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cima(c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c0)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cima(c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1))))))))
  anbi2d(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cmetu, c1))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c0)), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cima(c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1)))))))

blocks.name: cfilucfil4
blocks.content: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the Cauchy filters for the metric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: cncmet
blocks.content: The set of complex numbers is a complete metric space under the absolute value metric. (Contributed by NM, 20-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.content: The real numbers are a complete metric space. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
